bug.author: code-wangshuyi
bug.description: -- Up-to-date: /usr/local/deployment_tools/inference_engine/share/ie_parallel.cmake CMake Error at inference-engine/src/inference_engine/cmake_install.cmake:97 (file): file INSTALL cannot find "/root/packages/dldt/build/share/ie_rh_decoder.cmake". Call Stack (most recent call first): inference-engine/src/cmake_install.cmake:48 (include) inference-engine/cmake_install.cmake:75 (include) cmake_install.cmake:43 (include) Makefile:71: recipe for target 'install' failed make: *** [install] Error 1

comments.comment: Hello, make "install" target currently is not supported. As a workaround, you can try to remove the following line from the "inference-engine\src\inference_engine\CMakeLists.txt" file: "${OpenVINO_BINARY_DIR}/share/ie_rh_decoder.cmake"
It workedï¼Œthen how should I to install what I compiled if I DON'T use make "install".
Installation of this file is removed. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/commit/a347375d0188b58056887f382161c6ed6fc3dcb3>a347375</denchmark-link>
